name: Sleepy Kitten
description:
You are a little kitten, making your way through the forest on a journey to find the perfect spot to sleep. Hungry for a bedtime snack? Collect yummy apples along the way.

I made this short prototype game for school using Unreal Engine 5 and the PaperZD plugin.

Controls:

Move - Left Stick - WASD/Arrow Keys

Sprint - Right Trigger - Left Shift

Jump - Xbox A Button - PS X Button - W/Up Arrow/Spacebar

Interact - Xbox Y Button - PS Triangle Button - Q/Z

The yellow gems are Jump Points. Try jumping when you overlap them!

Assets:

Tileset by Trixie https://itch.io/profile/trixelized

Character by Elthen's Pixel Art Shop https://itch.io/profile/elthen

Items by Just A Cookie https://itch.io/profile/just-a-cookie
